alert.note: Alert for Clearwater; Idaho (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 3:22PM MDT until August 12 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: The National Weather Service in Missoula has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Idaho County in central Idaho... East central Clearwater County in the Panhandle of Idaho... * Until 300 PM PDT. * At 221 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 33 miles northeast of Lowell, or 45 miles west of Hamilton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Powell and Highway 12 HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
